Name: inst
Notes: 100 < inst < 200 is used for original ALFAM data, 200 < x is used for new data.

Name: database
Notes: 1 for original ALFAM data, 2 for new data

Name: first.row.in.file
Description: Location of data within file (file variable)

Name: last.row.in.file
Description: Location of data within file (file variable)

Name: n.ints
Description: Number of measurement intervals for plot

Name: dt1
Description: Duration of the first measurement interval

Name: dt.min
Description: Duration of the shortest measurement interval

Name: dt.max
Description: Duration of the longest measurement interval

Name: j.NH31
Description: Average ammonia flux in first measurement interval

Name: j.rel1
Description: Average relative ammonia flux in first measurement interval
Units: Fraction of applied TAN per h

Name: e.final
Description: Cumulative emission at the end of the measurements

Name: e.rel.final
Description: Relative cumulative emission at the end of the measurements

Name: air.temp.6
Description: Average air temperature over first 6 h

Name: air.temp.12
Description: Average air temperature over first 12 h

Name: air.temp.24
Description: Average air temperature over first 24 h

Name: air.temp.48
Description: Average air temperature over first 48 h

Name: soil.temp.6
Description: Average soil temperature over first 6 h

Name: soil.temp.12
Description: Average soil temperature over first 12 h

Name: soil.temp.24
Description: Average soil temperature over first 24 h

Name: soil.temp.48
Description: Average soil temperature over first 48 h

Name: rad.6
Description: Average solar radiation over first 6 h

Name: rad.12
Description: Average solar radiation over first 12 h

Name: rad.24
Description: Average solar radiation over first 24 h

Name: rad.48
Description: Average solar radiation over first 48 h

Name: wind.6
Description: Average wind speed over first 6 h

Name: wind.12
Description: Average wind speed over first 12 h

Name: wind.24
Description: Average wind speed over first 24 h

Name: wind.48
Description: Average wind speed over first 48 h

Name: wind.2m.6
Description: Average adjusted wind speed over first 6 h
Notes: Wind speed estimated at 2 m height

Name: wind.2m.12
Description: Average adjusted wind speed over first 12 h
Notes: Wind speed estimated at 2 m height

Name: wind.2m.24
Description: Average adjusted wind speed over first 24 h
Notes: Wind speed estimated at 2 m height

Name: wind.2m.48
Description: Average adjusted wind speed over first 48 h
Notes: Wind speed estimated at 2 m height

Name: wind.2m.mn
Notes: Wind speed estimated at 2 m height

Name: rh.6
Description: Average relative humidity over first 6 h

Name: rh.12
Description: Average relative humidity over first 12 h

Name: rh.24
Description: Average relative humidity over first 24 h

Name: rh.48
Description: Average relative humidity over first 48 h

Name: man.source.orig
Description: Source of manure (as entered in template)

Name: man.tan
Units: g/kg as N, wet mass basis

Name: man.tic
Units: g/kg as C, wet mass basis

Name: man.freeNH3
Notes: Calculated from air temperature, pH, and TAN

Name: man.eq.gasNH3
Notes: Calculated from air temperature, pH, and TAN

Name: crop.orig
Description: Crop present in field (as entered in template)
